name: Mega Golf
description:
Take your putter and hit your way through 9 nature-inspired golf courses. Use your terraforming abilities to shape the land to your desire and take magnificent trick shots. Practice in the sandbox to perfect your skills before hitting the course.

Press [M] to return to the menu. Press [P] to place the ball back at the start. Press [R] to reset the course.

Gameplay and programming collaboration between Ben Rowland and Mark Medved. Art and animations by Thane Wisherop. Sound design by Mark Medved and Ben Rowland using Bosca Ceoil.

Made for CMPM/ARTG 120: Game Design Experience at UCSC, Spring 2020.
